alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 29 at 9:03PM PST until January 31 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. 1 to 4 inches expected below 5000 feet, 4 to 9 inches expected 5000 and 6000 feet, 9 to 14 inches expected above 6000 feet. Wind gusts 30 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...Through 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will continue into Monday morning. Snow will become widespread and impactful this evening. Snow levels will drop to 4000 to 4500 feet on Monday and 3500-4500 feet early Tuesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
